languages.text: "Я..." {n}Маражай широко распахивает глаза. В них — изумление и неверие. Кажется, он доподлинно был уверен в исходе — и не ожидал того, что слышит сейчас. Губы ксеноса искривляются в разъяренном оскале — ненависть обращена к ксеносу на троне... и все же не находит выхода под взорами десятков друкари в зале.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Я..." {n}Маражай вскидывает голову в поисках поддержки, но наблюдающие архонты лишь снисходительно кривятся, а некоторые и вовсе откровенно смеются ему в лицо.{/n}

languages.text: "I..." {n}Marazhai's eyes widen, filled with astonishment and disbelief. He seems to have been certain of the outcome and did not expect what he is hearing now. His lips twist in an enraged snarl — hatred directed at the xenos on the throne — and yet it finds no outlet under the gazes of the dozens of Drukhari in the chamber.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Я..." {n}Маражай широко распахивает глаза. В них — изумление и неверие. Кажется, он доподлинно был уверен в исходе — и не ожидал того, что слышит сейчас. Губы ксеноса искривляются в разъяренном оскале — ненависть обращена к ксеносу на троне... и все же не находит выхода под взорами десятков друкари в зале.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "I..." {n}Marazhai's eyes widen, filled with astonishment and disbelief. He seems to have been certain of the outcome and did not expect what he is hearing now. His lips twist in an enraged snarl — hatred directed at the xenos on the throne — and yet it finds no outlet under the gazes of the dozens of Drukhari in the chamber.{/n}
"I..." {n}Marazhai throws his head up in search of support, but the archons watching him only smirk condescendingly, some even openly laughing in his face.{/n}

"I..." {n}Marazhai's eyes widen, filled with astonishment and disbelief. He seems to have been certain of the outcome and did not expect what he is hearing now. His lips twist in an enraged snarl — hatred directed at the xenos on the throne — and yet it finds no outlet under the gazes of the dozens of Drukhari in the chamber.{/n}
"I..." {n}Marazhai throws his head up in search of support, but the Archons watching him only smirk condescendingly, some even openly laughing at him.{/n}

"I..." {n}Marazhai's eyes widen, filled with astonishment and disbelief. He seems to have been certain of the outcome and did not expect what he is hearing now. His lips twist in an enraged snarl — hatred directed at the xenos on the throne — and yet it finds no outlet under the gazes of the dozens of Drukhari in the chamber.{/n}

"I..." {n}Marazhai's eyes widen, filled with astonishment and disbelief. He seems to have been certain of the outcome and did not expect what he is hearing now. His lips twist in an enraged snarl — hatred directed at the xenos on the throne — and yet it finds no outlet under the gazes of the dozens of Drukhari in the chamber.{/n}

languages.text: “我……”{n}玛拉斋瞪大了眼睛，目光中充满了震惊与怀疑。这场审判的结果他似乎本已十拿九稳，但此时此刻，他听到的答复却完全超出了他的预想。他发出了愤怒的咆哮，尖锐的恨意直指宝座上的黑暗灵族。然而，在王庭大厅内几十位黑暗灵族的注视之下，他无法发泄自己的怒火。{/n}
languages.original_text: "I..." {n}Marazhai's eyes widen, filled with astonishment and disbelief. He seems to have been certain of the outcome and did not expect what he is hearing now. His lips twist in an enraged snarl — hatred directed at the xenos on the throne — and yet it finds no outlet under the gazes of the dozens of Drukhari in the chamber.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “我……”{n}玛拉斋瞪大了眼睛，目光中充满了震惊与怀疑。这场审判的结果他似乎本已十拿九稳，但此时此刻，他听到的答复却完全超出了他的预想。他发出了愤怒的咆哮，尖锐的恨意直指宝座上的黑暗灵族。然而，在王庭大厅内几十位黑暗灵族的注视之下，他无法发泄自己的怒火。{/n}

languages.text: 「俺は…」{n}マラズハイは目を見開き、驚きと不信に満ちた表情を浮かべた。彼は結果を確信していたようだが、今聞いていることは予想していなかったようだ。その唇は怒りに歪み…その憎しみは玉座にいる異種族へと向けられていた。だが、室内にいる何十人ものデュカーリの眼差しのもとでは、それを発散するすべもなかった。{/n}
languages.original_text: "I..." {n}Marazhai's eyes widen, filled with astonishment and disbelief. He seems to have been certain of the outcome and did not expect what he is hearing now. His lips twist in an enraged snarl — hatred directed at the xenos on the throne — and yet it finds no outlet under the gazes of the dozens of Drukhari in the chamber.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「俺は…」{n}マラズハイは目を見開き、驚きと不信に満ちた表情を浮かべた。彼は結果を確信していたようだが、今聞いていることは予想していなかったようだ。その唇は怒りに歪み…その憎しみは玉座にいる異種族へと向けられていた。だが、室内にいる何十人ものデュカーリの眼差しのもとでは、それを発散するすべもなかった。{/n}

languages.text: «Yo...». {n}Marazhai está ojiplático, incapaz de ocultar su asombro e incredulidad. Parece que estaba seguro del resultado y no esperaba el giro actual de los acontecimientos. Sus labios forman una mueca de odio dirigida al xenos del trono, pero no encuentra contra quién descargarla entre los numerosos Drukhari de la sala.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I..." {n}Marazhai's eyes widen, filled with astonishment and disbelief. He seems to have been certain of the outcome and did not expect what he is hearing now. His lips twist in an enraged snarl — hatred directed at the xenos on the throne — and yet it finds no outlet under the gazes of the dozens of Drukhari in the chamber.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Yo...». {n}Marazhai está ojiplático, incapaz de ocultar su asombro e incredulidad. Parece que estaba seguro del resultado y no esperaba el giro actual de los acontecimientos. Sus labios forman una mueca de odio dirigida al xenos del trono, pero no encuentra contra quién descargarla entre los numerosos Drukhari de la sala.{/n}

languages.text: « Je... » {n}Marazhai écarquille les yeux d'étonnement et d'incrédulité, comme s'il ne s'attendait pas à ce que les événements prennent une telle tournure et qu'il avait du mal à en croire ses oreilles. Les traits soudain déformés par une grimace enragée, il prend conscience qu'il ne peut espérer aucun exutoire, pas même des dizaines de Drukharis présents dans la pièce.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I..." {n}Marazhai's eyes widen, filled with astonishment and disbelief. He seems to have been certain of the outcome and did not expect what he is hearing now. His lips twist in an enraged snarl — hatred directed at the xenos on the throne — and yet it finds no outlet under the gazes of the dozens of Drukhari in the chamber.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Je... » {n}Marazhai écarquille les yeux d'étonnement et d'incrédulité, comme s'il ne s'attendait pas à ce que les événements prennent une telle tournure et qu'il avait du mal à en croire ses oreilles. Les traits soudain déformés par une grimace enragée, il prend conscience qu'il ne peut espérer aucun exutoire, pas même des dizaines de Drukharis présents dans la pièce.{/n}

languages.text: "Ich ..." {n}Marazhais Augen weiten sich in einem Ausdruck aus Erstaunen und Ungläubigkeit. Er scheint sich des Ergebnisses sicher gewesen zu sein und hat nicht erwartet, was er jetzt hört. Er verzieht wütend die Lippen und entblößt seine Zähne ... sein Hass gilt dem Xenos auf dem Thron, findet unter den Blicken der zahllosen Drukhari in der Kammer aber kein Ventil.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I..." {n}Marazhai's eyes widen, filled with astonishment and disbelief. He seems to have been certain of the outcome and did not expect what he is hearing now. His lips twist in an enraged snarl — hatred directed at the xenos on the throne — and yet it finds no outlet under the gazes of the dozens of Drukhari in the chamber.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Ich ..." {n}Marazhai reckt auf der Suche nach Unterstützung den Kopf empor, aber die Archonten beobachten ihn nur und grinsen verächtlich, einige lachen ihn sogar offen aus.{/n}

languages.text: "Ben." {n}Marazhai'ın gözleri, hayret ve şaşkınlıkla açılıyor. Varılacak sonuçtan eminmiş ve şu an duyduklarına inanamıyormuş gibi görünüyor. Dudaklarını büzerek öfkeli bir hırıltı çıkarıyor. Nefreti direkt olarak tahtta oturan zenoya yöneltiyor olsa da odadaki onlarca Drukhari'nin bakışları altında bu öfkeyi dışa vuracak imkân bulamıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I..." {n}Marazhai's eyes widen, filled with astonishment and disbelief. He seems to have been certain of the outcome and did not expect what he is hearing now. His lips twist in an enraged snarl — hatred directed at the xenos on the throne — and yet it finds no outlet under the gazes of the dozens of Drukhari in the chamber.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Ben." {n}Marazhai'ın gözleri hayret ve şaşkınlıkla açılıyor. Varılacak sonuçtan eminmiş ve şu an duyduklarına inanamıyormuş gibi görünüyor. Dudaklarını büzerek öfkeli bir hırıltı çıkarıyor. Nefreti direkt olarak tahtta oturan zenoya yöneltilmiş durumda ancak odadaki onlarca Drukhari'nin bakışları altında bu öfkeyi dışa vuracak imkân bulamıyor.{/n}
